alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; San Rafael Swell; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties; Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 12:26PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...San Rafael Swell, Upper Sevier River Valleys, Western Millard and Juab Counties, Western Uinta Basin, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Sevier Valley, Sanpete Valley and Castle Country. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
